verses.roman:
aiśvarya-jñānete saba jagat miśrita
aiśvarya-śithila-preme nahi mora prīta

synonyms: aiśvarya jñānete—with knowledge of majesty; saba—all; jagat—the universe; miśrita—mixed; aiśvarya-śithila—weakened by majesty; preme—in love; nāhi—there is not; mora—My; prīta—pleasure.
translation: [Lord Kṛṣṇa thought:] "All the universe is filled with the conception of My majesty, but love weakened by that sense of majesty does not satisfy Me.
